ProductShortDescription: A luxury divan style upholstered bed in a Belgian damask material...
ProductDescription:
A luxury divan style upholstered bed in a Belgian damask material.

 

This bed is available with or without drawers which are strong and solid, quality that you can rely on.

 

This bed comes with a full 5-year guarantee and a Qflex mattress. Unlike some other companies, we only sell beds made from the best quality materials. As with all of our adjustable beds, you can sleep on it for up to 7 nights and if you are not totally satisfied, we will fully refund you the cost of the bed* or exchange your mattress free of charge.

 

Laybrook beds are also fully installed by our trained engineers, free of charge!

 

Sizes:

Available in 2ft 6, 3ft, 3ft 6, 4ft, 4ft 6, 5ft and 6ft - Special orders can be made to any height or length(restrictions do apply).

 

Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Thornbury is 22.5 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.

  • Beds without drawers can be made to any height (restrictions apply)
  • Beds with side drawers have higher minimum height

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height.

If your bed is ordered with a Vertical Lift, 1 inch is added to the total height of the bed.
Adding an end drawer will not affect height, but side drawers will add 2 inches to the overall height.
A Heavy Duty Frame will also add 1 inch to the total height.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Single bed altering the length £ 195
Double bed altering the length £ 245
Dual altering the length £ 295
Altering the height of bed £ 75

Bed Length

The length of the bed is 6ft 8'. The length can be adjusted (alteration costs apply)

* If you change the specification of the bed it will be a special order (non stock item) and will take upto 1 week longer to make and deliver.

Colour

The colour of this bed surround is golden.

The picture shown is a dual bed.
The bed also comes in a single or double.
Double bed has one mattress.
Dual bed has two mattresses (independent movement)

ProductShortDescription: A beautiful half divan adjustable bed which will complement any bedroom...
ProductDescription:
This bed has style and quality for a price that is unbelievable. The original adjustable bed is still a cut above any flat bed, and with a 1-year warranty, you cannot go wrong.
This bed is shown with a half divan surround. The carved wooden legs raise the surround 7 inches from the floor, providing lots of storage space.

 

Colour

The colour of this divan bed surround is beige.

 

Size:

Available in size 4ft 6 for a double (special orders can be made to any height or length)

 

Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Chatsworth is 22 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height by 1 inch.

A Vertical Lift is not supported by this bed.
A Heavy Duty Frame is not supported by this bed.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Double bed altering the length £ 245
Altering the height of bed £ 75

Bed Length

The length of the bed is 6ft 8'. However, it can be made shorter (additional costs apply).

 
 

 

If you change the specification of the bed, it will be a special order (non-stock item) and will take up to 1 week longer to make and deliver.

It can also be fully installed by our trained engineers, NOT FLAT PACKED like some companies.

 

The picture shown is a single bed.

You can NOT have the Vertical Lift, Heavy Duty frame, Leg Lifter or grab ring with this bed.

ProductShortDescription: A beautiful half divan adjustable bed which will complement any bedroom...
ProductDescription:
A beautiful half divan adjustable bed which will complement any bedroom.

 

This bed has a beautiful washable eco leather surround to give it an immaculate finish. The bed stands on legs and has castors for ease of movement. The bed has a 7 inch gap between the floor and the base, which is ideal when using a bed

table or hoist.

 

This bed comes with a full 5-year guarantee. Unlike some other companies, we only sell beds made from the best quality materials. As with all of our adjustable beds, you can sleep on it for up to 7 nights and if you are not totally satisfied, we will fully refund you the cost of the bed or exchange your mattress free of charge!

 

Laybrook beds are also fully installed by our trained engineers, free of charge!

 

Sizes:

Available in 4ft 6, 5ft and 6ft (Special orders can be made to any height or length)

 

Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Helston is 22 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height.

If your bed is ordered with a Vertical Lift, 1 inch will be added to the overall height.
A Heavy Duty Frame will also add 1 inch to the total height.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Dual bed altering the length £ 295

Altering the height of bed £ 75

Bed Length

The length of the bed is 6ft 8'. The standard length can be adjusted (for standard height alteration cost).

If you change the specification of the bed it will be a special order (non-stock item) and will take up to 1 week longer to make and deliver.

Colour

The colour of this divan bed surround is natural.

 

The picture shown is a single bed.

The bed also comes in a double or dual.

Double beds have one mattress.

Dual beds have two mattresses (independent movement)

ProductShortDescription: Luxury Dual adjustable bed with high quality Reflex mattress and removable washable cover....
ProductDescription:
NEW IN HOME DEMONSTRATION SERVICE ON THIS BED, TRY IN YOUR HOME FREE.
PHONE FOR DETAILS


Two Models. GUARANTEED BUY BACK ON ELECTRIC TURNING BED!

Non Electric Turning (Carer assisted, carer must manually turn bed) 5ft 6inches Dual Bed £5795

Electric Turning (No Carer Needed as per video) 6ft Dual Bed £7995 : RENTAL ON THIS BED : £450 per wk (Min 4 week rental) £90 per wk there after (electric turning bed only).

First 4 weeks rental will be taken off the purchase price if you purchase after 4 weeks.

Luxury Dual adjustable bed with high quality Reflex mattress and removable washable cover.

Luxury adjustable bed with high quality Reflex mattress.

Sizes: 5ft 6inch Dual and 6ft Dual.

The Electric Turning Bed from Laybrook is the ideal bed for a person who wants independence, as it puts the person from a seated position on the side of the bed and turns the bed into a flat position for sleeping. One push of the button will do a full rotation from seated to sleeping position without the need for carers, it helps getting legs onto the bed with the minimum of fuss and gives complete independence.

Features

90 degree rotation feature.
Height Adjustable
Grab Rails
Fully Profiling
Battery Back Up
Patient Grab Handle
Lockable Castors

NEW TILTING FUNCTION(When the bed has turned 90 degrees you now can tilt the bed like a riser recliner chair to help get in & out of the bed). see picture 4.

The model shown has a beautiful Belgian damask surround and has castors so it can be easily moved.

This bed comes with a full 5-year warranty. 

It is also fully installed by our trained engineers, NOT FLAT PACKED like some companies.

Colour
The colour of this divan bed surround is beige.

Sizes
5ft 6 and 6ft.

The picture shown is a single bed.
A dual bed has two mattresses (independent movement)

Bed height

Standard Bed height=22.5 inches from the floor to the top of mattress. Min starting height is 21inches, Alteration cost £75.00

If you change the specification of the bed it will be a special order (non stock item) and will take upto 1 week longer to make and deliver.
If this bed is returned a collection fee of £295 will be charged.

ProductShortDescription: A beautiful Pink half divan adjustable bed which will complement any girls bedroom...
ProductDescription:
A beautiful Pink half divan adjustable bed which will complement any girls bedroom.

This bed has a beautiful pink washable eco leather surround to give it an immaculate finish. The bed stands on lovely wooden legs.

This bed comes with a full 5-year guarantee. Unlike some other companies, we only sell beds made from the best quality materials. As with all of our adjustable beds, you can sleep on it for up to 7 nights and if you are not totally satisfied, we will fully refund you the cost of the bed or exchange your mattress free of charge!

Laybrook beds are also fully installed by our trained engineers, free of charge!

Sizes:

Available in 3ft (Special orders can be made to any height or length)

 

Bed height Breakdown


Standard size for the Jessica is 19 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height.

If your bed is ordered with a Vertical Lift, 3 inchs will be added to the overall height and longer legs made for the bed.
A Heavy Duty Frame will also add 1 inch to the total height.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Single bed altering the length £ 195
Double bed altering the length £ 245
Dual bed altering the length £ 295

Altering the height of bed £ 75

Bed Length

The length of the bed is 6ft 11 inches. The standard length can be adjusted (for standard height alteration cost).

If you change the specification of the bed it will be a special order (non-stock item) and will take up to 1 week longer to make and deliver.

Colour
The colour of this divan bed surround is pink.
 
The picture shown is a single bed.
The bed does not come in a double or dual.
Double beds have one mattress.
Dual beds have two mattresses (independent movement)

ProductShortDescription: All beds come as standard with a High Quality Reflex Mattress...
ProductDescription:
All beds come as standard with a High Quality Reflex Mattress.

The Helston Carers mobiity bed is an ideal Carers bed for someone looking stay close to their partner. This bed has separate motors to profile the bed at the head-end or the foot-end, and again separate motors to vertically raise the bed up to 18 inches from the starting position (standard height; 23 inches). Our new Carers mobiltiy bed can be raised flat for the carers to wash or turn the patient, or it can be used to help the person stand out of the bed like a riser recliner chair (must be sat on the edge (in the middle section) of the bed), or it can be raised whilst adjusted at the head and foot-end to get a comfortable high position to look out of the window.


The single vertical lifting frame can be put into any of our adjustable bed surrounds, so choose the bed you like (from the home page) and add the vertical lifting frame (in the mechanisms tab drop down), this will add the cost of the mechanism to any bed, or choose the combination as shown on this page.

Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Helston Carers Bed is 23 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Dual bed altering the length £ 295

Altering the height of bed £ 75

Bed Length

The length of the carers' mobility bed is 6ft 8'. The standard length can be adjusted (for standard height alteration cost).

Description

• 5 part adjustable profiling with integral raise and lower facility
• 4 motors (2 for profiling and 2 for lift)
• Vertical rise up to 18 inches from starting point
• Twin On-Line fittings
• Weight adjuster zone lumber section
• Centre belt
• Load bearing points bolted and sleeved
• Special order (may take upto 1 wk longer to make) 

 

Dual beds have independent controls and independant matttresses. You will generally have a vertical lifting mechanism on one side of a dual carers' mobility bed, so if you are purchasing a 5ft dual bed you will only need one 2ft 6 vertical lifting mechanism.

ProductShortDescription: Extra LOW, high / low profiling adjustable bed (Min height 16 inches from floor to top of mattress) with high quality Qflex mattress and removable washable cover...
ProductDescription:
Extra LOW, high / low  profiling adjustable bed (Min height 16 inches from floor to top of mattress) with high quality Qflex mattress and removable washable cover. This bed has a slate grey material in faux suede.

This profiling bed is designed to assist smaller person rise to a standing position, ideal for  a smaller person, you get comfort and it looks fantastic. This bed comes with a slide back mechanism as well to keeep you closer to your bedside cabenet.

This bed comes with a full 5-year guarantee. Unlike some other companies, we only sell beds made from the best quality materials. As with all of our adjustable beds, you can sleep on it for up to 7 nights and if you are not totally satisfied, we will fully refund you the cost of the bed or exchange your mattress free of charge.

Sizes:
Available in 2ft 6, 3ft, 3ft 6, 4ft,  5ft and 6ft - Special orders can be made to any height or length (restrictions do apply).
Profiling back angle 80-85 degrees (standard mechanism)
Profiling knee break angle 75 degrees with a height of 10 inches (standard mechanism)
 

Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Low Low Bed is 16 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress but this bed can start at any higher height on request for £75.

Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) will increase the overall bed height by 2 inches.

 
To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75! (restrictions apply)

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround

Colour

ProductShortDescription: This electric adjustable bed is unrivalled in quality as the base is upholstered and ..
ProductDescription:
The Lyndhurst

Sumptuously Upholstered Base and Surround

This electric adjustable bed is unrivalled in quality as the base is upholstered and not slatted which adds to the luxury style and quality feel of this electric bed.
Luxury profiling adjustable bed with high quality Q-flex mattress and removable washable cover.

The Lyndhurst bed is available with a fully upholstered drawer at the end, which would suit anyone that needs that extra storage space.

Beds without drawers can be made to any height (restrictions apply)
Beds with drawers have higher minimum height

This electric adjustable bed is fully adjustable and has a 5 part movement mechanism which is upholstered in a luxury velour, you get supreme comfort and a beautifully finished product. 
The model shown is upholstered in a beautiful velour and has castors enabling it to be easily moved.
This bed comes with a full 5-year guarantee. Unlike some other companies, we only sell beds made from the best quality materials. As with all of our standard adjustable beds, you can sleep on it for up to 7 nights and if you are not totally satisfied, we will fully refund you the cost of the bed or exchange your mattress free of charge.


Sizes
Available in 5ft and 6ft - Special orders can be made to any height or length - (restrictions apply)
Profiling back angle 80-85 degrees (standard mechanism)
Profiling knee break angle 75 degrees with a height of 10 inches (standard mechanism)
 
Bed height Breakdown
Standard size for the Lyndhurst is 22 inches from the floor to the top of the mattress.
Purchasing any Sprung Mattress (Pocket or Superior) may increase the overall bed height.
If your bed is ordered with a Vertical Lift, 1 inch is added to the total height of the bed.
A Heavy Duty Frame will also add 1 inch to the total height.

To make sure the height of your bed is correct when ordering, please measure your own first. We are able to alter your bed to a height of your choice, and all for an extra £75!

Altering the length means altering the mattress, mattress cover, mechanism and surround
Single bed altering the length           £ 195
Double bed altering the length          £ 245
Dual bed altering the length              £ 295
Altering the height of bed                  £   75

Bed Length
The length of the bed is 6ft 8'. However, it can be made longer or shorter (additional costs and restrictions apply).
If you change the specification of the bed it will be a special order (non stock item) and will take up to 1 week longer to make and deliver.

Colour
The colour of this divan bed surround is a light grey.
The picture shown is a dual bed.
This bed is also available as a single or double.
A double bed has one mattress.
A dual bed has two mattresses (independent movement)
